title: (x) ACNE - Century Expanded {Marc O}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124028im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28128.gif)   
   
   
   
   
   
I'm having a "spot" of bother with it.
author: chooonz

comments.content:
Century Expanded   
   
Available from several sources, including:   
http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-expanded/

That's weird... I got mine in at 10:18, but when I edited it to add a [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124028/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-expanded/century-expanded/testdrive.html?s=ACNE&p=72), I got an error saying my message didn't exist. The code that runs the board seems a bit fragile today...
